panels.description: Total number of garbage collections done by the Go app.

panels.description: Memory currently used by the Go app for storing live objects.

panels.description: Memory that the container is currently using and is not free.

panels.title: Available Volume Storage

panels.title: Tempo Build Info

panels.title: Container CPU Usage (Total Time)

panels.description: Number of clients sending trace data to the Tempo distributor.

panels.description: Shows how many Tempo requests took how much time to complete â€” like under 1s, 2s, 5s.

panels.title: Failed Flush Retries

panels.description: How much time Tempo took to save data, grouped by seconds.

panels.description: It shows how many times Tempo found problems in trace data.
